sentences.en: Beneath the sentimental psychobabble, there's a likeable movie trying to get out.
sentences.cn: 在多愁善感的心理学呓语之下，一部本有可能受到喜爱的电影挣扎欲出。

sentences.en: Europe's divisions are the subtext of a new movie thriller called Zentropa.
sentences.cn: 新上映的惊悚电影《欧罗巴》背后的潜台词是欧洲的分裂。

sentences.en: First released in 1957, the movie now appears in a new print.
sentences.cn: 1957年首次上映后，这部影片现在有了新的拷贝。

sentences.en: For the movie business, it was all downhill from there.
sentences.cn: 电影业从那时就开始完全走下坡路了。

sentences.en: I don't want to be treated like a cosseted movie queen.
sentences.cn: 我不愿意被人当作是个娇纵惯了的电影皇后。

sentences.en: I get criticized for the portrayal of women in that movie.
sentences.cn: 我在那部电影里对女性形象的刻画受到了批评。

sentences.en: If you're a Billy Crystal fan, you'lllove this movie.
sentences.cn: 如果你是比利·克里斯托的影迷，你会喜爱这部影片。

sentences.en: It didn't matter that Ingrid had outdistanced them as a movie star.
sentences.cn: 作为一名影星，英格丽已经远远地超越了她们，但这却无关紧要。

sentences.en: It was like one of those old John Wayne movies.
sentences.cn: 这部电影有点像约翰•韦恩演的一部老片子。

sentences.en: It's ideal for people who like a sloppy movie.
sentences.cn: 对于喜欢伤感电影的人来说，这部影片再合适不过了。

sentences.en: The movie industry had chosen to ignore the encroaching competition of television.
sentences.cn: 电影业故意无视电视业的侵犯性竞争。

sentences.en: The opening scenes of this movie are just not true to life.
sentences.cn: 这部电影开场的几幕真是太假了。

sentences.en: They are raking in the profits from each more audaciously violent movie.
sentences.cn: 通过一部部更加大胆的暴力电影，他们攫取了巨额利润。

sentences.en: This could be the feel-good movie of the autumn.
sentences.cn: 这可以称得上是今秋令人赏心悦目的影片了。

sentences.en: This is an ambitious and intriguing movie, full of striking imagery.
sentences.cn: 这是一部气势恢宏、引人入胜的电影，充满了动人心魄的瑰丽意象。

sentences.en: This movie made him the most bankable star in Hollywood.
sentences.cn: 这部电影让他一举成为好莱坞最具票房号召力的明星。

sentences.en: We took the kids to the movies .
sentences.cn: 我们带孩子们去看电影。

sentences.en: We took the kids to the movies.
sentences.cn: 我们带孩子们去看电影。

phrases.tran_cn: 恐怖片，惊恐片；恐怖电影

trans.tran_en: a film made to be shown at the cinema or on television
